structure.unit: OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH OF EMPLOYEES

law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 22. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4866b-4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Toilet and dressing rooms to be provided for employees.
